title: Battle royale ‘Apex Legends Mobile’ for iOS to launch in ten additional countries next week
content:
If you are still expecting for battle royale-style game Apex Legends Mobile to arrive in your country, maybe next week could be your chance to enjoy the app, as the developer just announced an expansion.

more…

The post Battle royale ‘Apex Legends Mobile’ for iOS to launch in ten additional countries next week appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apex Legends Mobile for iOS will arrive in ten more countries starting next week, according to a developer's post on its website.
